attributes.action: Make start time for schools and colleges 1 hour later. I.e. Students ages 11-18!
attributes.background: Teenagers body clocks are not naturally supposed to wake up so early. It is proven! Teenagers can't help being tired in the morning!

rejection.details: This is a decision for individual schools and colleges and not the UK Government or Parliament. You could try raising this issue with the senior management of the school or college, or the governing body.
